-e ---

𒍼 GIG sick < 𒈪 kako (black/night) 𓎡𓎡𓇰 𒈪 plague
𒍼 GIG krank 𒈪+𒉭egg (نەخۆش nexoş бо́лен bólen)
𒍼 sick Seth 𓃩 𓃫 disease illness classifier/determinant
𒍼 •krank 𒍼 •grain grano grûnë grurë "(gray)wheat" 𒍼 /gimg/ •gomg قَمْح qamḥ gheg 𑄉𑄧𑄟𑄴 gam গম gom "(black)wheat" 𒍼 /ging/ 𒍼 𒄃 гандум gandum "wheat" 𒍼 𒄃 gig;gib;kib #kibtu חִיטָּה khitá "wheat"

𒍼 ⁿgi/tur nieder(ig) 𓈖 𓆓 𓋴 𓅪 small ⁿGIG genna 𒌉𒁹 young
𒍼 gi/tur giutur cute 𓎡𓏏𓏏𓅪 छोटा choṭā, short

𒍼 small vs 𒂂 heavy •big

𒍼 vs ILL L 𒁇 LA₂ 𒇲 LAL₂ 𒇳 low lil' little => small -- less
